parties.title: The Talk Show with John Gruber Live
parties.details: Tickets are not yet available, but will be soon.

parties.title: Beard Bash 2017 at WWDC
parties.details:
Why is it called the Beard Bash?

Quite simple because I have a big beard and it seemed like a fun name.

Do I need a beard to attend?

LOL, no. The party is open to developers in town during WWDC, although space is limited.

Why do you have a party?

Iâ€™ve been doing this party for the last six years as a way to say thanks to developers for all the hard work they do. Itâ€™s a night where they donâ€™t have to worry about anything, just having a good time.

Will there be music?

Oh yes! We have a band play every year. This will be a concert party with great music!

Do I need a ticket?

Yes. Tickets are free, but you will need to RSVP in order to attend the party. The process is very simpleâ€”we will make an announcement on how to RSVP as we get closer to WWDC.

Can I bring a friend?

If your friend registers for a ticket, sure ðŸ™‚

Will alcohol be served?

Yes, beer (lots of Heineken) and wine will be free. Mixed drinks can be purchased. There will also be non-alcoholic beverages available.

Do I need to be 21 years old to attend?

No, this is an all ages party. If you would like to drink, you will need to show your ID to get a wrist band.

Where and when will the party be held?

The party is being held at the City National Civic Center in San Joseâ€”directly across the street from WWDC. The event will be on 
Monday, June 5, 2017 from 8 pm -12 am.

Is the party sponsored?

Yes we have a number of companies that sponsor the party. There are limited sponsorship spots available, but if you are interested please email me directly.

parties.title: James Dempsey and the Breakpoints
parties.details:
Save The Date!
Wednesday Night, June 7, 2017
We're gearing up for a show during WWDC week that you will not want to miss. For the second year, weâ€™re teaming up with WWDCGirls for an evening of mingling and music to benefit App Camp For Girls.

Playing humorous tech songs, including favorites from their Billboard-charting album Backtrace, the annual James Dempsey and the Breakpoints show has become a WWDC week tradition. No WWDC ticket is requiredâ€”anyone in town for the week can attend.

This year we're performing at the amazing City National Civic Theaterâ€”right across the street from WWDC. 

We'll announce full details soon â€” but it is shaping up to be our biggest show ever, weâ€™re very excited!

The show sold out quickly last year. Join our low-volume list to find out first when tickets are available.

parties.title: WWDC 2017 - San Jose Relay FM Meetup
parties.details: Come hangout with Relay FM on Monday, June 5 at the San Jose Museum of Quilts and Textiles. The event runs from 7:00 - 9:30 PM. We will be serving several different local craft beers and SUPER FANCY Italian sodas. The event is open to all ages, but be sure to have your ID if you want a beer.
parties.address1: San Jose Museum of Quilts and Textiles

parties.title: Better Elevation Extravaganza
parties.details:
We've been hard at work on something really cool that we think you'll enjoy. This party is where we finally get to talk about it, celebrate, and thank the community that helped inspire us.

Free drinks
Live music from Airplane Mode and The Outer Vibe
A series of delightful surprises
Guaranteed fun or your money back
If you're a member of an underrepresented group and want to make sure you can get a ticket, please contact Dave. We want this to be an amazing event where everyone feels welcome.

It's going to be a great year for indie creators. We owe a lot to Apple and the development community. Let's party.

parties.title: Accidental Tech Podcast Live
parties.details:
Accidental Tech Podcast Live @ AltConf, June 5th - 5pm
Monday June 5th, 2017 5-7pm. Limited availability for this one-off event - reserve your spot today!

parties.title: Apple WWDC Keynote Breakfast & Viewing
parties.details:
Come have a hearty breakfast and watch the WWDC Keynote courtesy of thoughtbot before heading down to San Jose! Say hello to other early rising developers & designers while sipping on mimosas.
This event is open to everyone, regardless of whether or not you snagged a ticket to WWDC. AltConf attendees and hungry iOS developers are welcome!

parties.title: buddybeers: WWDC Edition
parties.details:
Join the buddybuild team at Paper Plane SJ for a special WWDC edition of buddybeers!
Mix, mingle, and discuss the latest Apple news with your fellow app developers over a cocktail, pint (or two)!
There'll be complimentary food / drinks, special edition t-shirts and other goodies to give away, and we'll help you setup your first mobile CI build for your app!
Space is limited, so reserve your spot today! 


Buddybuild is a continuous integration, deployment and user insights platform built specifically for mobile development teams.

This happy hour is hosted in collaboration with Parties for WWDC - the aggregator of developer parties happening in San Jose during WWDC 2017.
Download the app and swing by buddybeers to meet the creator!
